fourier_features.description: The number of Fourier features that the data coordinates are projected to

fourier_scale.description: The standard deviation of the Fourier features

num_blocks.description: The number of blocks in the network

learning_rate.description: The learning rate for the `Adam` optimizer

num_epochs.description: The number of epochs for which the network is trained

mini_batch_size.description:
The optional mini-batch size used during training

 Setting the mini-batch size to `None` disables the use of batching,
 i.e. the network is trained using one large batch that includes the
 full data.

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator used during encoding

_version.description: The codec's version. Do not provide this parameter explicitly.

description:
Fourier network codec which trains and overfits a fourier feature neural
 network on encoding and predicts during decoding.

 The approach is based on the papers by Tancik et al. 2020
 (<https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.5555/3495724.3496356>)
 and by Huang and Hoefler 2020 (<https://arxiv.org/abs/2210.12538>).
title: FourierNetworkCodec
